title: Threats from riot?

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body: I  switched rolls with one of my duo partners and i got this message at the end of the game. Is this a threat riot? What does this mean? Does this mean my solo queue will go back to how it originally did as far as ranking? because i'm all for that. In case the link doesn't work it says "Frequent trading could lead to a deactivation of positional matchmaking.

replies.body:
...by Sigmar, i have no idea how the new ranked system works. 

So you cannot trade positions because you will get punished for that? Can i get some clarification on this?

Only if you do it A LOT.
It's to prevent people from abusing matchmaking by queuing for off-roles and then playing their primary anyway.
A couple games where you make the trade because someone else got autofilled and you don't mind switching is fine.
But if you do it for like 5 games in a row the system is going to get suspicious and probably punish you.

It only effects you if you regularly swap roles. Riot will gradually treat the role you were assigned and the role you swapped to as the same when matchmaking you.

Basically you'd lose the advantage of the Positional MMR on those roles, meaning your MMR will be determined the same as it was last year.
How does it even track what position you are? If I que as bot Ashe, pick Ashe, then go top, how does it know I'm top?

Because you went top, and that is pretty bloody obvious.

Exactly how it works is unknown, but it seems to track where you go, where you farm, and compare it to what other players are doing.

Where it breaks down is when people start playing off-meta, it cant figure out off-meta duo lanes, and has been seen swapping support and ADC while the whole spellthief klepto thing was going on, due to thinking the non-farming ADC was the support.
Probably because you spend all your time in the top lane.

That is exactly what it said, and yea, I'm all for that too - lol


Any ranked reset that happens I wish to be added to the list of players who request one on themselves - please refer to this tweet 
https://twitter.com/RiotSapMagic/status/1098820557385084928
i guess they dont like people trading much
